evidence.claim: Health Products Xchange utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations and integrates health data securely.
HPX uses EDI X12 transaction sets for healthcare transactions.
Health Products Xchange implements FHIR standards for interoperability.
They leverage Azure for their cloud service needs.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in healthcare data exchange with relevant X12 transactions; fits target size.
